_comment: Created by ianb on 03/10/2013 16:40:27 using v0.9
title: How has the proportion of respondents reporting poor care changed?
analysis_commentary: Despite the lack of comparability with the data, the proportion of people feeling that their care was poor or very poor has consistently been around 9% for all years, suggesting that patients have been satisfied with their care.
data_source: Care Quality Commission, Community Mental Health Survey
